sentences.en: " This is my younger brother; He's young and inexperienced in company. Come and see him often. "
sentences.cn: “ 这是我的弟弟, 小孩子,不懂交际, 你常来同他玩吧. ”

sentences.en: Being ignorant, raw, and inexperienced, I thought I loved her.
sentences.cn: 由于无知, 不成熟, 缺乏经验, 我以为我爱她.

sentences.en: Given that they are inexperienced, they've done a good job.
sentences.cn: 鉴于他们缺乏经验, 这项工作他们做得不错.

sentences.en: Given that they're inexperienced, they've done a good job.
sentences.cn: 在缺乏经验的情况下, 他们的工作已经算是做得相当不错了.

sentences.en: He is inexperienced in the academic world.
He is young and inexperienced, but please do not count that against him.
sentences.cn: 他年轻而无经验, 但请不要因此而低估他.
他在商业方面缺乏经验.

sentences.en: He was too inexperienced and too inexpert to succeed.
sentences.cn: 他太缺乏经验，太不熟练，难以成功。

sentences.en: He was too new, too inexperienced, and the mandarins knew too little about him.
sentences.cn: 他资历太浅, 太没经验, 官僚们对他了解太少.

sentences.en: He's very young and inexperienced, and doesn't know about the ways of the world.
sentences.cn: 他还很年轻,又缺乏经验, 不懂得人情世故.

sentences.en: High-powered cars are lethal weapons in the hands of inexperienced drivers.
sentences.cn: 马力大的汽车到了缺乏经验的司机手中便成了毁灭性的武器。

sentences.en: Hsin - mei said, " Maybe I was too young and inexperienced then to judge him correctly.
sentences.cn: 辛楣 说: “ 也许那时候我年纪轻,阅历浅,没看清人.

sentences.en: She was inexperienced and needed a guiding hand .
sentences.cn: 她缺乏经验，需要有人指导。

sentences.en: The inexperienced soldier let the gun off in error.

words.tran_cn: 缺乏经验；无经验；不熟练

trans.tran_cn: 无经验的，不熟练的，陌生，不经事
